item.description: This race, which draws crowds over over 1,000, supports the National Multiple Sclerosis Society, Greater New England Chapter. Great crowd, and the Boston Volvo Village dealership is nice about letting you unofficially stash bags near the guard desk. Several fundraising teams participate - if you sign up, just go to register as "a member of an existing team" and choose TMIRCE! $20 online registration before November 18, or $25 on-site registration at the event. http://eventmam.natio...

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Boston Volvo 5K Road Race, Thanksgiving Day, Nov. 24
